error_details: This validation task requires Playwright MCP browser automation capabilities to execute UI tests against https://app.bayzat.com/. The current environment does not have Playwright MCP tools available, preventing browser automation, navigation, element interaction, and screenshot capture.

test_results.test_name: Client is unable to remove Processed Air tickets
test_results.notes: Skipped due to missing Playwright MCP integration. Test requires: (1) Navigate to Settings > Workflows, (2) Create Air Tickets Auto Encashment workflow, (3) Process air ticket in payroll, (4) Reopen payroll month, (5) Reject payroll transaction, (6) Verify deletion options become available

test_results.test_name: FE: Show remaining air tickets when balance is on hold due to booking request
test_results.notes: Skipped due to missing Playwright MCP integration. Test requires: (1) Create air ticket allowance policy, (2) Navigate to employee dashboard, (3) Initiate booking request, (4) Verify remaining balance visibility during pending booking, (5) Verify balance updates after completion

test_results.test_name: FE: Unclear indication of available air ticket requests
test_results.notes: Skipped due to missing Playwright MCP integration. Test requires: (1) Create air ticket policy with request limits, (2) Submit requests to reach limit (0/1 scenario), (3) Verify display clarity of request counter, (4) Test various request count scenarios (1/5, 3/10)

test_results.test_name: Need to remove processed (Encashment) Air tickets with Payroll reopen
test_results.notes: Skipped due to missing Playwright MCP integration. Test requires: (1) Create air ticket encashment workflow, (2) Process encashment in December payroll, (3) Reopen December payroll, (4) Delete encashment transaction, (5) Move request to pending, (6) Reassign to January payroll
